Comment: geniusacamel gives me the chance to avenge my loss. I decide to go back to an old favourite especially as I predict a French Defence after scouting his games.
Preparation rewarded. Part 2 of the plan retain the initiative even if it means sacking material.
3.Nc3 is the most active move in this position I think. 3.Nd2 is more of a restraining black type of move and 3.e5 though gaining space can get stodgy whilst still allowing black counterplay
